react-mantine.name: pointer
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the input should have cursor: pointer style, false by default

react-mantine.name: withErrorStyles
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the input should have red border and red text color when the error prop is set, true by default

react-mantine.name: valueIsNumericString
react-mantine.description: If value is passed as string representation of numbers (unformatted) and number is used in any format props like in prefix or suffix in numeric format and format prop in pattern format then this should be passed as true. false by default

react-mantine.name: clampBehavior
react-mantine.description: Controls how value is clamped, strict â€“ user is not allowed to enter values that are not in [min, max] range, blur â€“ user is allowed to enter any values, but the value is clamped when the input loses focus (default behavior), none â€“ lifts all restrictions, [min, max] range is applied only for controls and up/down keys

react-mantine.name: startValue
react-mantine.description: Value set to the input when increment/decrement buttons are clicked or up/down arrows pressed if the input is empty, 0 by default

react-mantine.name: decimalSeparator
react-mantine.description: Character used as a decimal separator, "." by default

react-mantine.name: fixedDecimalScale
react-mantine.description: If set, 0s are added after decimalSeparator to match given decimalScale. false by default

react-mantine.name: decimalScale
react-mantine.description: Limits the number of digits that can be entered after the decimal point

react-mantine.name: thousandsGroupStyle
react-mantine.description: Defines the thousand grouping style

react-mantine.name: thousandSeparator
react-mantine.description: A character used to separate thousands

react-mantine.name: numberOfColumns
react-mantine.description: Number of columns to render next to each other

react-mantine.name: maxTags
react-mantine.description: Maximum number of tags, Infinity by default

react-mantine.name: maxDropdownHeight
react-mantine.description: Max-height of the dropdown, only applicable when withScrollArea prop is true, 250 by default

react-mantine.name: limit
react-mantine.description: Maximum number of options displayed at a time, Infinity by default

react-mantine.name: pointer
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the input should have cursor: pointer style, false by default

react-mantine.name: searchable
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the select should be searchable, false by default

react-mantine.name: selectFirstOptionOnChange
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the first option should be selected when value changes, false by default

react-mantine.name: withCheckIcon
react-mantine.description: Determines whether check icon should be displayed near the selected option label, true by default

react-mantine.name: withErrorStyles
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the input should have red border and red text color when the error prop is set, true by default

react-mantine.name: withScrollArea
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the options should be wrapped with ScrollArea.AutoSize, true by default

common.name: name
common.description: The name of the field and the key of the JSON

common.name: label
common.description: Label of the field

common.name: hint
common.description: Help text for the field (generally shown below the input box)

common.name: placeholder
common.description: Placeholder text, visibile when the field is empty

common.name: disabled
common.description: Disables and greys out the field

common.name: readOnly
common.description: Put the field in read only mode

common.name: hidden
common.description: Hides the field from the form

react-rsuite5.name: mask
react-rsuite5.description: Use ${d} - digits, ${D} - any non digits, ${a} - any non alpha chars, ${w} - any word chars

react-rsuite5.name: keepCharPositions
react-rsuite5.description: When true, adding or deleting characters will not affect the position of existing characters

react-rsuite5.name: showMask
react-rsuite5.description: When the input value is empty, the mask is displayed as a placeholder instead of a regular placeholder

react-rsuite5.name: placeholderChar
react-rsuite5.description: The placeholder character represents the fillable spot in the mask

react-rsuite5.name: fullWidth
react-rsuite5.description: Set the width of the field to 100% of the enclosing container

react-rsuite5.name: width
react-rsuite5.description: Set the width (in pixel) of the field

react-rsuite5.name: size
react-rsuite5.description: Size of the field

react-rsuite5.name: tooltip
react-rsuite5.description: Show hint as tooltip next to label

react-rsuite5.name: prefix
react-rsuite5.description: Fixed heading text

react-rsuite5.name: inside
react-rsuite5.description: Show prefix and postfix inside the input box

react-rsuite5.name: postfix
react-rsuite5.description: Fixed trailing text

react-antd.description: Not clean input on blur even when the typing is invalidate

react-antd.description: Set the readonly attribute of the input tag (avoids virtual keyboard on touch devices)

react-antd.description: Need click confirm button to trigger value change. Default false when multiple

react-mantine.name: size
react-mantine.description: Size of the field

react-mantine.name: valueFormat
react-mantine.description: Dayjs format to display input value, "DD/MM/YYYY HH:mm" by default. Check https://day.js.org/docs/en/display/format for reference

react-mantine.name: firstDayOfWeek
react-mantine.description: number 0-6, 0 - Sunday, 6 - Saturday, defaults to 1 - Monday

react-mantine.name: hideOutsideDates
react-mantine.description: Determines whether outside dates should be hidden, defaults to false

react-mantine.name: labelSeparator
react-mantine.description: Separator between range value

react-mantine.name: fullWidth
react-mantine.description: Set the width of the field to 100% of the enclosing container

react-mantine.name: width
react-mantine.description: Set the width (in pixel) of the field

react-mantine.name: dropdownType
react-mantine.description: Type of dropdown, defaults to popover

react-mantine.name: allowDeselect
react-mantine.description: Determines whether user can deselect the date by clicking on selected item, applicable only when type="default"

react-mantine.name: clearable
react-mantine.description: Determines whether input value can be cleared, adds clear button to right section, false by default

react-mantine.name: hideWeekdays
react-mantine.description: Determines whether weekdays row should be hidden, defaults to false

react-mantine.name: hasNextLevel
react-mantine.description: Determines whether next level button should be enabled, defaults to true

react-mantine.name: maxLevel
react-mantine.description: Max level that user can go up to (decade, year, month), defaults to decade

react-mantine.name: numberOfColumns
react-mantine.description: Number of columns to render next to each other

react-mantine.name: columnsToScroll
react-mantine.description: Number of columns to scroll when user clicks next/prev buttons, defaults to numberOfColumns

react-mantine.name: withCellSpacing
react-mantine.description: Determines whether controls should be separated by spacing, true by default

react-mantine.name: pointer
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the input should have cursor: pointer style, false by default

react-mantine.name: withErrorStyles
react-mantine.description: Determines whether the input should have red border and red text color when the error prop is set, true by default

common.description: Hides the field from the form

react-material-ui.name: centered
react-material-ui.description: If true, the tabs are centered. This prop is intended for large views

react-material-ui.name: fullWidth
react-material-ui.description: Will make the tabs grow to use all the available space

react-bootstrap.name: transition
react-bootstrap.description: Sets a default animation strategy for all children

react-bootstrap.name: fill
react-bootstrap.description: Have all Tabss proportionately fill all available width

react-bootstrap.name: justify
react-bootstrap.description: Have all Tabs evenly fill all available width

react-antd.name: size
react-antd.description: Size of the field

react-mantine.name: grow
react-mantine.description: Determines whether tabs should take all available space, false by default

react-mantine.name: activateTabWithKeyboard
react-mantine.description: Determines whether tab should be activated with arrow key press, true by default

react-mantine.name: allowTabDeactivation
react-mantine.description: Determines whether tab can be deactivated, false by default

react-mantine.name: autoContrast
react-mantine.description: Determines whether active item text color should depend on background-color of the indicator. If luminosity of the color prop is less than theme.luminosityThreshold, then theme.white will be used for text color, otherwise theme.black. Overrides theme.autoContrast. Only applicable when variant="pills"

react-mantine.name: inverted
react-mantine.description: Determines whether tabs should have inverted styles, false by default

react-mantine.name: keepMounted
react-mantine.description: If set to false, Tabs.Panel content will be unmounted when the associated tab is not active, true by default

react-mantine.name: loop
react-mantine.description: Determines whether arrow key presses should loop though items (first to last and last to first), true by default
